T02D2592:4b-0: @4b # // rgya gar skad a'arya manydzu shr'i n'a ma sam g'i ti bi dhi s'u tra pitra ti /
T02D2592:5a-0: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres @5a * //
T02D2592:5a-2: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2592:5a-3: ye shes sku can gtsug gi nor bu mtshan //
T02D2592:5a-4: sangs rgyas gzugs kyi tshul gnas kun la khyab //
T02D2592:5a-5: lam mchog dam pa ston pa sman pa'i mchog / sdug bsngal bdud 'dul 'jam mgon phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2592:5a-6: mtshan brjod bdud mdzod shin tu rtogs dka' ba //
T02D2592:5a-7: bdag blo mun pas dgrol bar mi nus kyang //
T02D2592:5a-8: dad pas phyogs bzung thigs pas nor bu gcig / lung dang man ngag dag la brten pa bshad //
T02D2592:5a-9: theg pa rnams kyi gzhir 'gyur ba //
T02D2592:5a-10: dus gsum rnams kyi lam mchog 'di //
T02D2592:5a-11: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul dang ni //
T02D2592:5a-12: slob dpon rnams kyi dgongs pa yis //
T02D2592:5a-13: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
T02D2592:5a-14: dpag bsam shing chen 'dir phyogs tsam //
T02D2592:5a-15: ye shes lus can 'jam dpal gcig pur grub //
T02D2592:5a-16: mdo dang bsres pa'i cho ga rim pa ste //
T02D2592:5a-17: de la dang po sgrub pa po rigs dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid ba stan pa'i phyir yin //
T02D2592:5a-18: gzhan yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin ston zhes mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang //
T02D2592:5a-21: gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs //
T02D2592:5a-23: bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur //
T02D2592:5a-24: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed //
T02D2592:5a-25: ces pas bsgrub pa'i snod du rung bar ba stan //
T02D2592:5a-28: nags tshang tshing na 'dug kyang rung zhes pa gnas
T02D2592:5a-29: rig pa dang ldan pa'i yid dga' ba ston to
T02D2592:5a-30: // bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la //
T02D2592:5a-32: bsgrub dus gza' dang rgyu skar dang ;
T02D2592:5a-33: nyi ma shis pa la bya ba'i rim pa ba stan to //
T02D2592:5a-34: dpal ldan 'byor pa phun sum tshogs //
T02D2592:5a-35: zhes pas bsgrub pa'i rdzas su don dam rab tu gnas par bya ba dang /
T02D2592:5a-39: mchod bya'i khyad par mang po dang /
T02D2592:5a-42: tshogs par bya ba'i rim pa ba stan to //
T02D2592:5a-43: yon tan las ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i rgyal po zhes pa dang /
T02D2592:5a-44: gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal //
T02D2592:5a-45: zhes pas mtshams kyi rim pa /
T02D2592:5a-46: h'um mtshan ma las khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed mdog nag pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D2592:5b-0: thod dbyug dang @5b sdigs mdzub byed pa /
T02D2592:5b-1: sprul dang thod pas brgyan pa bskyed la /
T02D2592:5b-2: ya m'anta ka h'um zhes pa dang /
T02D2592:5b-3: mig tu ma dang ta bkod de /
T02D2592:5b-4: 'od zer gyi rdo rje ra ba dang /
T02D2592:5b-5: dra bar bya bar ba stan to //
T02D2592:5b-6: snying rje chen po'i blo yi mchog / ces pa dang /
T02D2592:5b-7: phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa //
T02D2592:5b-9: sems can gyi don du bdag gis 'jam dpal thob par bya'o zhes sems bskyed par ston to //
T02D2592:5b-10: gnyis med gnyis su med par ston //
T02D2592:5b-12: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / ces pas
T02D2592:5b-13: thog ma med pa'i byang chub kyi sems thabs dang
T02D2592:5b-14: shes rab kyi brdar gyur pa'i snying gar ye shes
T02D2592:5b-15: sems dpa' bsam par bya ba ston to //
T02D2592:5b-16: bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog / ces pa dang /
T02D2592:5b-18: rtag tu rim gror bya ba'i 'os //
T02D2592:5b-19: bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog / phyag byar
T02D2592:5b-20: 'os pa zla ma'i bdag / ces pa 'dis ston
T02D2592:5b-21: to // bdag gi snying gar aa dang h'um bsams te /
T02D2592:5b-22: de las 'od 'phros pas bla ma dang /
T02D2592:5b-25: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs nas /
T02D2592:5b-27: lus kyi bkod pa yan lag gsum bskor ba byas te phyag byas la bstod do //
T02D2592:5b-28: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog / ces pa dang /
T02D2592:5b-29: dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste //
T02D2592:5b-30: zhes pas mchod pa'i khyad par nam mkha' ltar mnyam par bsgrub pa la /
T02D2592:5b-31: snying ga'i lha mos dbul lo zhes ston to //
T02D2592:5b-32: spyin bdag chen po'i gtso bos te //
T02D2592:5b-33: tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog / bzod chen 'chang ba ston pa po //
T02D2592:5b-34: brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin //
T02D2592:5b-36: sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pas //
T02D2592:5b-37: bdag gi snying gnas lha mo bzhi spros te /
T02D2592:5b-38: gnas pa rnam pa gsum du mchod par bya'o //
T02D2592:5b-40: dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che //
T02D2592:5b-41: dga' chen rol mo chen po ste //
T02D2592:5b-42: bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs //
T02D2592:5b-44: bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2592:5b-46: smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste //
T02D2592:5b-48: byang chub yan lag me tog spos //
T02D2592:6a-0: phyi'i lha mo bzhi ste snying ga nas @6a * //
T02D2592:6a-1: gong gi tshul du sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas gnas su dbul lo //
T02D2592:6a-2: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
T02D2592:6a-4: dga' ba chen po mgu ba che //
T02D2592:6a-6: gsang ba bzhi mchog tu gsang ba bzhis ba stan to //
T02D2592:6a-7: aom rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa na //
T02D2592:6a-8: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
T02D2592:6a-9: rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pas //
T02D2592:6a-10: rdo rje las kun byed pa'o //
T02D2592:6a-11: zhes bya ba 'di'i rkang pa dang /
T02D2592:6a-12: gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dus su /
T02D2592:6a-13: sgeg mo la sogs pa dang /
T02D2592:6a-14: rim bzhin du rkang pa bzhi dang glu blang bar bya'o //
T02D2592:6a-15: gzhan yang mchog tu gsang ba'i mchod pa dang ;
T02D2592:6a-16: chags pa la sogs pas dbul lo //
T02D2592:6a-17: rgyas pas ma phye'o zhes ba stan to //
T02D2592:6a-18: de nas 'dud nyi shus bstod de /
T02D2592:6a-19: yang na ni thams cad kyang bstod par shes par bya'o //
T02D2592:6a-20: de nas sdom pa bzung ba'i mthar yang de nyid kyis shes par bya'o //
T02D2592:6a-21: byams pa dang snying rje ni shin tu gsal bar ston pas /
T02D2592:6a-22: tshad med bzhi bsgom zhes so //
T02D2592:6a-23: rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad //
T02D2592:6a-24: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
T02D2592:6a-25: yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med //
T02D2592:6a-26: chos dbyings dam pa zad min bdag / ces pas de'i don bsgom pa ni //
T02D2592:6a-27: rang bzhin dag pa'i sngags brjod do //
T02D2592:6a-28: phyi dang nang gi dngos po stong par bsgom zhes ston to //
T02D2592:6a-29: stong nyid dam pa 'dod chags blo //
T02D2592:6a-30: srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste //
T02D2592:6a-31: zhes pas padma'i steng na dngos gzhi las langs te /
T02D2592:6a-32: dang po dam tshig sems dpa' bsgom pa dang /
T02D2592:6a-34: de'i tha ma 'od zer lngas bskor ba'i nang du /
T02D2592:6a-35: padma zla ba'i steng du mum dmar skya'o //
T02D2592:6a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phreng bar 'gyur ba las /
T02D2592:6a-37: sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar //
T02D2592:6a-39: nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes //
T02D2592:6a-40: sen mo'i 'od ni shin tu dmar //
T02D2592:6a-41: cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse //
T02D2592:6a-42: ska mchog mthon ka chen po can //
T02D2592:6a-43: zur phud lnga pa me tog thod //
T02D2592:6a-44: rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D2592:6a-45: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
T02D2592:6a-46: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
T02D2592:6a-47: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2592:6a-48: dpal ldan sgeg dang sgeg par ldan //
T02D2592:6b-0: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan @6b 'chang ba //
T02D2592:6b-1: nyon mongs g-yul du gcig dpa' ba //
T02D2592:6b-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis /
T02D2592:6b-3: rje btsun gyi sku sprul pa'i cha lugs ba stan pa yin no //
T02D2592:6b-4: phyag rgya bzhi yi don ba stan pa //
T02D2592:6b-5: zhes bya bas yul bzhi'i phyag rgya sku 'phro 'du
T02D2592:6b-6: dang bcas pas byin gyis brlab par ba stan to
T02D2592:6b-7: // phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed //
T02D2592:6b-8: ces pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D2592:6b-9: khro bo dang lha mo rnams thugs kar spros zhes pa'o //
T02D2592:6b-10: de nas mdun du padma dang zla ba la /
T02D2592:6b-11: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te /
T02D2592:6b-14: bstod pa gong bzhin du byas te /
T02D2592:6b-15: ye shes sems dpa' bltas la dgug cing rang gi
T02D2592:6b-16: lus la bsgoms zhes pas gnyis su med par byas
T02D2592:6b-17: te / rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
T02D2592:6b-18: sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can //
T02D2592:6b-19: zhes pas snying ga'i 'od kyis bskul te /
T02D2592:6b-20: bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bas rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan zhes ba stan to //
T02D2592:6b-22: zhes pas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la /
T02D2592:6b-24: dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du sangs rgyas thams cad sprul la zhes ston te /
T02D2592:6b-26: bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa //
T02D2592:6b-27: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / ces pa thams cad sems kyi sprul par shes par bya'o //
T02D2592:6b-31: de ltar yon tan brjod pa las kyang /
T02D2592:6b-32: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa gang la la /
T02D2592:6b-33: bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' thams cad /
T02D2592:6b-34: sku gnyis su med pa'i don dam pa'i ming yang dag par brjod pa'i ming ni /
T02D2592:6b-35: gtsug gi nor bu 'di thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2592:6b-36: ma nyams shing lhag chang med par tshigs su bcad ba'i tshig dang /
T02D2592:6b-38: nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du 'chang ba'am /
T02D2592:6b-40: kun chub par byed pa dang /
T02D2592:6b-41: gzhan dag la yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang /
T02D2592:6b-42: ming gi don gang yang rung ba re re nas
T02D2592:7a-0: kyang 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku @7a *
T02D2592:7a-1: // la dmigs te zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2592:7a-2: sems rtse gcig tu bsgom pa de la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2592:7a-4: nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du mnyam par yi dam du lan gsum du 'don tam /
T02D2592:7a-5: glegs bam du byas pa la klog cing brjod la /
T02D2592:7a-6: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' gzugs la dmigs shing /
T02D2592:7a-7: gzugs dang gnyis su mthun par bsam gtan du byed pa ni /
T02D2592:7a-8: 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir ring por mi thogs par
T02D2592:7a-9: de nyid du sprul pa'i gzugs kyi lus mthong bar
T02D2592:7a-10: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin te ;
T02D2592:7a-11: mtshan nyid kyi cho ga rdzogs shing /
T02D2592:7a-12: dmigs pa la yun ring du gnas pa des /
T02D2592:7a-13: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la /
T02D2592:7a-14: manydzu shr'i h'am aom w'a g'i shva ri mum /
T02D2592:7a-15: mandala tsakra h'um zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rnam par sprul la /
T02D2592:7a-16: phyag sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa la sogs pas bdag gi lus de dang mnyam par sprul te /
T02D2592:7a-17: mtshan gyi don re re nas bstod na /
T02D2592:7a-18: yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di ltar smos pas bdag gzhan dpag tu med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2592:7a-19: mdor na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring por mi
T02D2592:7a-20: thogs par dam pas bsngags pa thob par 'gyur ro
T02D2592:7a-21: // dam par rgyud pa'i bla ma bdud rtsi 'thung //
T02D2592:7a-22: 'gro ba sdug bsngal nad kyis zin gyur la //
T02D2592:7a-23: dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstod tshig 'di //
T02D2592:7a-24: sman pa'i rgyal po bzhin du bdag gis bshad //
T02D2592:7a-25: 'phrod pa'i sman bzhin kun la phan 'gyur nas //
T02D2592:7a-26: mi rtog ye shes 'chi med thob par shog /'phags
T02D2592:7a-27: pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i
T02D2592:7a-28: mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga /
T02D2592:7a-29: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa //
T02D2592:7a-30: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud le'u khri drug stong pa las /
